stories.title: Mini preview cycles through shelf rybs with fade
stories.description: Top-right mini preview should cycle through each ryb in the shelf set every N seconds with a smooth fade in/out transition. Interval and fade duration are developer-configurable.

stories.title: Shelf preview independent from Full Ryb Editor view
stories.description: The hero shelf preview and the top-right mini preview should not change when the user switches views in the Full Ryb Editor (top/front/side/3d).

stories.title: Gentle camera sweep/pan on preview canvases
Fix mesh shimmer artifacts on complex freeform shapes
Backplane system replaces rods
stories.description: Replace Wall Mount / Rods section with Backplane configuration. Backplane is a flat panel that sits against the wall with slots cut into it for rybs to slot through. Includes material thickness, slot depth, and dogbone radius controls.

stories.title: Dogbone fillet slots for CNC router clearance
stories.description: Slot cutouts in the backplane have semicircular dogbone fillets at each end for CNC router bit clearance. Uses makerjs stadium shape (rectangle + semicircle caps).

stories.title: Makerjs-powered DXF/SVG export
stories.description: Replace basic DXF/SVG generation with makerjs exporter for CNC-quality cut files. Includes sheet layout on 1220x2440mm panels, proper entity types, and unit handling.

stories.title: Increase max ryb count from 30 to 200
stories.description: Reference CNC files have ~100 rybs. Increase the ryb count slider max from 30 to 200.

stories.title: DXF accuracy testing against reference CNC file
stories.description: Empirical test harness using ezdxf (Python) to parse generated DXF and compare to reference CNC_FILE_105_12MM.dxf. Measures ryb count, slot count, backplane presence, and shape accuracy. Target 80% accuracy.
